parameters.functionScript:
const baseApi = Inputs.baseApi


Outputs.api = baseApi + `?pagination[pageSize]=1000`

const paganation = Inputs.Pagination

if (!paganation) return;
Outputs.page = paganation.page - 1; // page được chọn
Outputs.pageSize = paganation.pageSize; // Số phàn tử ở mỗi trang
Outputs.pageCount = paganation.pageCount; // Tổng số trang 
Outputs.total = paganation.total; // Số phần tử có trong data

const data = Inputs.data
const page = Inputs.page < 0 ? 0 : Inputs.page
const limit = Inputs.limit || 10

const start = page * limit
const end = start + limit

const dataSlice = data?.slice(start, end) || []

Outputs.data = dataSlice
Outputs.page = page || 0
Outputs.limit = limit
Outputs.total = data?.length

const Location = Inputs.Location

if (!Location) return

const lat = Location?.lat
const lng = Location?.lng

Outputs.url = `https://www.google.com/maps?q=${lat},${lng}`
window.location.reload();
window.location.reload();

const API = Inputs.apiUrl;
const API_UPLOAD = Inputs.apiUpload;
//http://194.233.66.115:1337/api

Outputs.API = API
Outputs.IMAGE_URL = API_UPLOAD
Outputs.AUTH_LOGIN = API + '/auth/local'
Outputs.GET_ME = API + '/users/me?populate=*'
Outputs.CREATE_USER = API + '/auth/local/register'
Outputs.SUPPORT = API + '/support-organizations'
Outputs.GET_ADDRESS_SUPPORT = API + '/organization-addresses?populate=Province&populate=District&populate=Ward&populate=SupportOrganization&filters[SupportOrganization]='
Outputs.GET_USER = API + '/users'
Outputs.GET_DISASTERS = API + '/disasters' // Lấy thiên tai
Outputs.GET_DISASTERS_TYPE = API + '/disaster-types'
Outputs.SOS = API + '/sos-requests'
Outputs.POSTS = API + '/posts'

// DIA CHI
Outputs.PROVINCES = API + '/provinces?pagination[pageSize]=100'
Outputs.DISTRCTS = API + '/districts?pagination[pageSize]=100'
Outputs.WARDS = API + '/wards?pagination[pageSize]=100'

dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript

parameters.functionScript:
if(!Inputs.Options) return // No options, no fun

Component.Object.Checkboxes = Inputs.Options.map((o,idx) => Noodl.Object.create({
    id:Component.Object.id+'-'+o,
    Value:o,
    Label:Inputs.Labels!==undefined?Inputs.Labels[idx]:o,
    Checked:Inputs.Selection!==undefined && Inputs.Selection.indexOf(o) !== -1
}))

Component.Object.Selection = Component.Object.Checkboxes.filter(o => o.Checked).map(o => o.Value)
Outputs.Changed()

parameters.functionScript:
const controlItem = Component.RepeaterObject

controlItem.Value = Inputs.Value

Noodl.Objects[controlItem.ObjectId][controlItem.Property] = Inputs.Value

Noodl.Events.emit(Component.ParentObject.id + '-Form.ValueChanged',{
    Property:controlItem.Property,
    Value:Inputs.Value
})

parameters.functionScript: Outputs.ItemId = Noodl.Objects[Inputs.RowId].ItemId

comments.text:
This is the Table component. It extracts headers and the type of cells it should create from it's imput data.

The Group called "Header" contains a Repeater that creates the headers cells, and the group called "Rows" contains a repeater that creates rows based on the input data. 

If you want to change the border/divider between the Header Row and the rest of the table, select the group called "Header Row" and change the values for it's bottom border.

If you want to change the background color for the rows, go to the subcomponent called "Row". That is also where the cells are created. 

If you want to change the cell padding go to the subcomponent called "Base Cell" and change it there. Every type of cell is based on the Base Cell subcomponent.
If you want to chang the padding of all your cells, change it in the Base Cell Root node.

parameters.functionScript: Outputs.Blur()

dynamicports.name: inputMappingScript

parameters.functionScript: Outputs.backgroundColor = Inputs.ChildIndex%2?0:1

comments.text:
This component represents a row in the table. It has a repeater that creates the different cells that should be in each row.

If you want to add different borders/dividers between your rows, you can do that on the Row group using the Border property

This Color Blend node controls the background color of even or odd rows.

To change the even rows color, change the Color 0 property.

To change the odd row color, change the Color 1 attribute.

roots.label: Update the value of the object

parameters.functionScript:
const cell = Component.RepeaterObject

cell.Value = Inputs.Value

Noodl.Objects[cell.ItemId][cell.Field] = Inputs.Value

Noodl.Events.emit(Component.ParentObject.id + '-Table.CellChanged',{
    ItemId:cell.ItemId,
    Field:cell.Field,
    Value:Inputs.Value
})
Outputs.Blur()
